Articles.Content:
HI everyone.

I must admit, I have no talent for glorious or funny presentations so this one might seems boring.

So I'm Resethel, nice to meet you. I'm an engineering student, currently chilling at home. I've installed KSP, like... 3 weeks ago, yet already hitting the 500h of playing it (just too show how I got invested in the game). So I'm quite experienced despite being new here. Let's say that my social anxiety didn't help establishing contact ahah .

 

This community seems great from what I saw, and I hope you'll all accept me here. Many thanks

Hello Resethel and welcome to the KSP forums!

This game does tend to draw one in, doesn't it?  Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Yea definitely... You get sucked in without even noticing it ^^'... Just one mission turn out to be 2-3h long ahah.

Thank you!!!

Nice to meet you, nothing boring about saying hi.

Welcome to the forums!

On 26/08/2016 at 3:07 PM, Resethel said:

I've installed KSP, like... 3 weeks ago, yet already hitting the 500h of playing it

Welcome, it's good to have you aboard. Hope you enjoy yourself on the forum, though playing KSP 24 hours per day probably takes up so much of your time I doubt we'll see much of you

Don't forget to sleep from time to time, I heard it has health benefits

Welcome.  

I'm all out of Likes, sorry.
